Everyone who's seen this short Flash video has been quoting pieces to me non-stop. I figured it was worth spreading the virus: The video is courtesy of Mike Adair - who clearly has his priorities in order. Bonus points to anyone who spots me in San Jose and tells me to buy things at "the other store." Copied! Back to Top
